trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<input type= checkbox>" /> element on the server.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control to allow the user to select a `true` or `false` state.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項即可允許使用者選取`true`或`false`狀態。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the control is selected, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.Checked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否已選取控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.Checked%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.Checked%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項提供<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange>事件所引發的時機<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.Checked%2A>屬性變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立事件處理常式，每次引發事件時執行一組自訂的指示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control does not post back to the server when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項未公佈至伺服器時按一下。

trans-unit.source: You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> control, to send the state of the control back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 您必須提供支援張貼至伺服器，例如網頁上的另一個控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>控制，可將控制項的狀態傳送至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a set of simple responses to users selecting from a group of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範簡單回應使用者的群組從選取的一組<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The "checkbox" literal string.
trans-unit.target: "Checkbox"常值字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> is selected.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> control is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" />已選取控制項，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>選取控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to programmatically set the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可用來以程式設計方式設定狀態的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a set of responses to users selecting from a group of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何回應使用者的群組從選取的一組<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
The collection of all incoming name values.
Processes the postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> control.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> control's state has changed as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This method is primarily of interest to custom control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是擴充功能的自訂控制項開發人員感興趣的主要<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
Raises the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> event and registers the control as one that requires postback handling.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnPreRender%2A> method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnPreRender%2A>方法會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnPreRender%2A> is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnPreRender%2A> 主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnPreRender%2A> method in a custom server control so that a `Title` attribute is added to each <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnPreRender%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓`Title`屬性加入至每個<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event information.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange" /> event.
This method allows you to handle the event directly.
This event is raised when the Web page is submitted to the server and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control changes state from the previous post.
trans-unit.target: 網頁上送出至伺服器時，會引發這個事件與<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項從先前的張貼變更狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to override the base implementation and provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您覆寫基底實作，並提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange>事件才能正確運作。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnServerChange%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnServerChange%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method to signal the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> control that the state of the control has changed.
This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充的功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> instance that contains the output stream to render on the client.
Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> control's attributes to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> instance.
Occurs when the Web page is submitted to the server and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> control changes state from the previous post.
This event is raised when the Web page is submitted to the server and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox> control changes state from the previous post.
trans-unit.target: 網頁上送出至伺服器時，會引發這個事件與<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>控制項從先前的張貼變更狀態。

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange>事件才能正確運作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
The collection of all incoming name values.

Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox" /> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" /> method by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" /> method.
